description: This dataset details traffic counts in the Chicago Southland from 2010 thru 1998. This dataset is a mashup of IDOT, County, and CMAP traffic counts

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA Local Traffic Counts
